name: GoldRush (briZoft)
description:
You can choose between two difficulties ; Normal & Hardcore, affecting torch states, enemies spawn rate and score per chests.

Collect Gold to beat you high score and your friends high score, accumulate Gold in your stash to unlock abilities !

With your gathered Gold, you can purchase abilities and unlock free upgrades in the 'Gold in stash reward tiers' section. 

Fight monsters and kill them to have a chance to drop small passive upgrades for your run.

Find the Golden Key to be able to escape and save your score. The time before the Golden key has been found affects the total score of your run.

Find an exit gate to escape the level to save your score.

Local leaderboards to challenge your friends and keep track of your performance !
